main.name: Nicola Dean
main.bio: Hi there! I have been very passionate about computers and programming since my university life. During my journey I discovered Machine Learning and it has been love at first sight. With a curiosity that knows no bounds, I am eager to explore the depths of this field, unraveling its mysteries and pushing boundaries. I aspire to join a reputed software company where I can contribute to cutting-edge projects, fueling my passion and curiosity along the way. Let's embark on this exciting journey together!
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to to build any software for your business.!

quotes1.title: I Would Love to make your Ideas real
quotes1.description: I love graphic design and photography and have been working on my portfolio since 2016. You can download my resume in order to learn the details of my professional life as a designer and photographer. Contact me and we will discuss your projects!

quotes2.title: I can give your business a new creative start right away! Hire me for your Awesome project

education.description: Specialized in Machine Learning and Hardware Accelerator

work.title: Flutter Tutor
work.description: As a tutor in the course ”Do an App” held by Policollege my impact was twofold: Assisting Teacher during the lectures and providing personalized support, feedback, and mentorship to the students helping them developing their Flutter skills and professional growth.

resume.skillssectiontitle: Motivated by the Desire to achieve Success

projects.title: Edge AI Project
projects.description: Designed a Free parking slot counter that can operate on STM32 microcontrollers By leveraging the TinyML library and Tensorflow Lite.

projects.title: Sparse Convolution Pytorch
projects.description: Contributed to the Open source Escoin-caffe sparse convolution implementation by engegnering a pytorch porting.

projects.title: Insulink
projects.description: Developed React Native App to improve diabetic people experience in tracking blood sugar level, meals, sport and allow them calculating insulin units to get.

projects.title: Caliper-gpu
projects.description: The Caliper framework has been enhanced through the development of a CUDA version, resulting in a remarkable 72x speedup in computing the MTTF (Mean Time To Failure) of a multicore homogeneous grid of cores.

projects.title: Vulkan Render Engine
projects.description: DIY 3D Render Engine written in C++ and Vulkan for the Computer Graphic course.

services.title: Machine Learning Engineering
services.description: I can design machine learning systems with expertise and precision. Let's create innovative solutions together!.

services.title: Embedded - Firmware Development
services.description: I have extensive experience in firmware development using C++ and CUDA, enabling efficient and high-performance computing. Let's unlock new possibilities together
